Description: If ‘center’ aligns center of bar to x-axis value; if ‘edge’ aligns the left edge of the bar to the x-axis value
Hex color string for the edge of the bar
Width of the edge of the bar in pixels

Hex color string of the error bar lines
Transparency value for the bars between 0-1
Hex color string of the bar fill
Rolling mean window size [enables this curve]
Stack bars of a given group
Set the fractional width of the bars between 0-1
Hex color string for the rolling mean line
Width for the rolling mean line in pixels
